tag_to_content.div_14: Founding Managing Partner at JSCapital, Founding Partner at The Israeli Association for Ethics in AI. Former Co-Founder at IBA, Co-Founder and CEO at Jerusalem Startup Hub, Founder at Mi Project.

tag_to_content.div_60: We are market and domain agnostic with an investment focus based on three elements: technology, time to market, and people.
tag_to_content.div_62: We focus on startups from the Seed stage to Series A, with technology solutions expected to be in high demand in the short and medium term.
tag_to_content.div_64: We are dedicated to the technological excellence of the startup and are not afraid of unconventional approaches.
tag_to_content.div_66: First of all, we are looking for prominent people. Our dream founder is inspiring, extremely adaptive and honest, a real mensch. Did we say founder? We mean the whole team.

tag_to_content.div_78: We are seeking a highly motivated Automotive Regulation Manager to join our dynamic team at CorrActions. As our Automotive Regulation Manager, you will play a crucial role in researching and analyzing current regulations and standards worldwide, stay updated on future regulatory trends, and establishing effective communication and relations with regulators and policymakers. This role will be a key part of our effort to improve vehicle safety and shape the future of the automotive industry.   Contact us:
tag_to_content.li_20: Regulatory Research: conduct comprehensive research and analysis of existing regulations applicable to driver monitoring systems. Stay abreast of relevant changes in regulations, policies, and standards at national, federal, and international levels.
tag_to_content.li_21: Future Regulatory Trends: anticipate and monitor upcoming regulatory trends and governmental policies that may impact driver monitoring systems. Provide strategic insights and recommendations regarding potential implications and opportunities.
tag_to_content.li_22: Compliance Assessment: assess and interpret regulatory requirements. Evaluate the impact of regulations on our products, services, and operations to ensure compliance.
tag_to_content.li_23: Regulatory Advocacy: develop and execute strategies to engage with regulatory authorities, industry leaders, and policymakers.
tag_to_content.li_24: Policy Positioning: research and analyze regulatory proposals, white papers, and requests for information. Formulate clear and concise policy positions, white papers, and responses based on a thorough understanding of the industry's needs and our company's objectives.
tag_to_content.li_25: Cross-functional Collaboration: collaborate with internal teams to align regulatory objectives with business goals. Provide guidance on regulatory requirements and implications during product development and launch processes.
tag_to_content.li_26: Industry Monitoring: monitor competitor activities and industry trends related to regulations and compliance.
tag_to_content.li_27: Proven experience working in regulatory affairs, public policy, or government relations within the automotive industry or a closely related field.
tag_to_content.li_28: In-depth knowledge of automotive regulations and safety standards with a strong understanding of incumbent and future regulatory trends.
tag_to_content.li_29: Familiarity with the legislative and regulatory processes at national, federal, and international levels.
tag_to_content.li_30: Excellent analytical skills and ability to interpret complex regulations.
tag_to_content.li_31: Strong interpersonal and communication skills to build relationships and effectively engage with regulators, industry leaders, and other stakeholders.
tag_to_content.li_32: Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
tag_to_content.li_33: Attention to detail and a commitment to ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.
tag_to_content.li_34: Flexibility to adapt to changing regulatory environments and navigate ambiguity.
tag_to_content.li_35: Outstanding communication skills and the ability to effectively convey information.
tag_to_content.div_79: Cydome is the leading maritime cyber security company providing innovative solutions for shipping and port operators to protect the world's most important supply chain. We empower IT managers to detect threats and act effectively to overcome them, while ensuring continual compliance to the highest standard. Our customers include Top-100 shipowners. We're looking for someone who's both a skilled craftsman and a knowledgeable scientist, with a passion for the maritime industry. This person will be responsible for owning Cydome's product vision, strategy and roadmap. Exciting, right?!     Contact us:

tag_to_content.div_97: The head of engineering & operations leads the manufacturing team, and is the key figure in driving process engineering, scale-up, streamlining production, logistics and manufacturing. In this role, he or she must ensure the health and safety of the production team, maintain the highest quality standards, meet company KPIs and drive continuous improvement in efficiency.
tag_to_content.li_169:
Scale-up: Collaborate with R&D, QA and other branches, and lead the scaling of new products and technologies. Work
closely with engineering and manufacturing teams to identify potential challenges and implement effective solutions
during the scale-up process.
tag_to_content.li_170:
Plant and production management: Oversee the entire production process, ensuring safety, optimal performance,
adherence to production schedules, and compliance with quality standards. Foster a culture of collaboration,
accountability and excellence, provide guidance and create professional development opportunities for the members of
the team.
tag_to_content.li_171:
Logistics and supply chain: Develop and implement an efficient logistics strategy to ensure timely and cost-effective
delivery of raw materials and finished products, optimize inventory and maintain strong relationships with suppliers.
tag_to_content.li_172:
Operational excellence and continuous improvement: Implement process 
improvement initiatives to optimize
production workflows, reduce waste, and increase overall operational efficiency
tag_to_content.li_174: Bachelor's degree, preferably in engineering, mechanical, food science, or other related fields.
tag_to_content.li_175:
Proven track record (2+ years) of successful operations management experience within the food manufacturing or
FoodTech industry (dairy / proteins).
tag_to_content.li_176: In-depth knowledge of food processing technologies, supply chain management, and quality assurance standards.
tag_to_content.li_177: Strong leadership skills with a hands-on approach

Minimum of 2 years of experience operating and maintaining machinery in a
food/pharmaceutical/cosmetics production environment.

tag_to_content.div_100: Revuze provides a cloud-based business solution essential for marketing, product management, business development, and customer service. Our AI-enabled software analyzes millions of customer reviews, online opinions, and offline pieces of unstructured data to deliver experience-related insights and intelligence. Our clients use Revuze to monitor and manage their own company's customer experiences and to maintain a view of what customers are saying about the competition. Strategic Enterprise Account Executive will be responsible for generating revenue for Revuze by creating, cultivating and developing accounts and increasing market share. S/he will be expected to exceed revenue goals by planning and executing successful sales within North America's largest Enterprises. On a typical day you will: - Strategically develop a portfolio of new accounts in order to achieve year-on-year account growth and hit sales targets - Manage the sales cycle from solution proposing, presentation, negotiating and closing - Build cross functional relationships within the prospect in order to penetrate the account further by focusing on director/C-level engagement - Leverage account planning to surface insights that guide commercial activities with the goal of delivering value for clients, building awareness for Revuze, and uncovering opportunities - Design, orchestrate, and execute highly effective outreach campaigns (covering warm and cold relationships) in order to generate a consistent stream of monthly meetings - Collaborate with team members to win deals through effective team-selling, including meeting preparation, meeting follow-ups, proposal development, deal closing activities - Use Salesforce CRM to ensure knowledge transfer regarding account development, outreach progress, and opportunity pursuit - Develop accurate forecasts and manage sales activity in CRM (Salesforce.com) - Ability to quickly build trusted working relationships with a variety of people and personalities - You are inquisitive and skilled at developing account plans that surface actionable insights - Comfort in reaching out to clients to arrange meetings and can work past obstacles with persistence and poise - Skill at senior-level B2B selling and able to thrive in a team-selling environment - Passion, proactive, and thirst for excellence and results - Excellent communication and presentation skills. Ability to persuade, lead, and confidently handle objections and resolve customer objections - High integrity, energy and dedication. We are looking for uncommonly good Account management professionals with a highly collaborative, value-driven, honest, and direct approach to delivering customer success - Documented success in SaaS, enterprise software sales. The ideal candidate will have experience client-direct sales and be highly successful at running consultative sales processes in large, complex prospect organizations. Experience in presenting to and interacting with senior management of prospect organizations - A Bachelor's degree or equivalent and 5+ years of experience as a standout performer in professional services sales. A Master's degree is valued but not required. - You are proficient in MS Office and Google Suite and well-versed in Salesforce.com, or an equivalent CRM - Ideally experience of working in a hyper-growth or start-up type of business - Ideally experience of taking a new, disruptive technology to market from a new sales perspective Contact us:
tag_to_content.strong_27: What will I bring to the team?

Our clients use Revuze to monitor and manage their own company's customer experiences and to maintain a view of what customers are saying about the competition.    Contact us:

tag_to_content.div_102: Our expanding TLV engineering team is looking for an agile & talented senior developer. This position will work alongside world-class security and product teams, all of whom are inspired by the use of breakthrough technologies to help safeguard Wib's fast-growing customer base around the world. We have a large product portfolio that built upon plenty of cutting-edge techs, from real-time inspection using stream & batch processing, to penetration-tests simulation using top-researchers experience, and much more. As a senior developer, you will take a central role in building Wib's products. You will choose and use cutting edge technologies and methodologies and will have a real impact on the company. You will be involved in every part of our core products' lifecycle - from defining features together with PM, choosing the right tech stack and architecture to implementing infrastructure and features     Contact us:

You will be involved in every part of our core products' lifecycle -- from defining features together with PM, choosing the right tech stack and architecture to implementing infrastructure and features

tag_to_content.li_225: Experience with designing, developing, and debugging complex, distributed systems (cloud-native, microservices, event-driven).
tag_to_content.li_226: Experience with developing large-scale, data-oriented applications.
tag_to_content.li_227: Experience working on and operating a service, with modern operative concepts (CI/CD, On-call, No QA, etc.)
tag_to_content.li_228: Experience with container and orchestration technologies (Kubernetes, Docker).
tag_to_content.li_229: Experience with Kafka and the various technologies in its ecosystem
tag_to_content.li_230: Good architecture knowledge and work experience with complex backend systems and data flows - an advantage
tag_to_content.li_231: Soft skills: soul player, devoted, responsible, kind.
